languages.text: "Это вряд ли... Боритесь, друзья! Не бойтесь, умирать за правое дело не больно!"
"Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"
languages.original_text: "Это вряд ли... Боритесь, друзья! Не бойтесь, умирать за правое дело не больно!"

traits.locale_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, dying does not hurt as much if your cause is righteous!"
"Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, dying does not hurt as much if your cause is righteous!"
"Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"
"Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"
"Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

languages.text: “我恐怕没戏了……继续战斗，朋友们！不要害怕，为正义牺牲没有一丝痛苦！”
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: “我恐怕没戏了……继续战斗，朋友们！不要害怕，为正义牺牲没有一丝痛苦！”

languages.text: 「そうはいかなそうだ…戦い続けてくれ、友よ！恐れるな、正義の名の下の死は、痛みを伴わぬ死だ！」
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうはいかなそうだ…戦い続けてくれ、友よ！恐れるな、正義の名の下の死は、痛みを伴わぬ死だ！」

languages.text: « Sûrement pas... Continuez à vous battre ! N'ayez pas peur, mourir au nom d'une juste cause est indolore ! »
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: « Sûrement pas... Continuez à vous battre ! N'ayez pas peur, mourir au nom d'une juste cause est indolore ! »

languages.text: «Ni lo sueñes... ¡Seguid luchando, compañeros! No temáis, ¡la muerte por una causa noble es indolora!».
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: «Ni lo sueñes... ¡Seguid luchando, compañeros! No temáis, ¡la muerte por una causa noble es indolora!».

languages.text: "Das wird nicht passieren ... Kämpft weiter, Freunde! Habt keine Angst. Für eine rechtschaffene Sache zu sterben, ist ein schmerzloser Tod!"
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: "Das wird nicht passieren ... Kämpft weiter, Freunde! Habt keine Angst. Für eine rechtschaffene Sache zu sterben, ist ein schmerzloser Tod!"

languages.text: "Yok... Savaşın dostlar! Korkunuz olmasın, haklı davamız uğruna ölmek can yakmaz!"
languages.original_text: "Not going to happen... Keep fighting, friends! Do not be afraid, death in the name of a righteous cause is a painless death!"

traits.locale_text: "Yok.... Savaşadurun dostlar! Korkunuz olmasın, haklı davamız uğruna ölmek can yakmaz!"
